setting: A modern world three months after a viral outbreak turned most of humanity into ravenous infected.

lore.title: The Genesis Outbreak
lore.summary: The catastrophic emergence and spread of the Necromorph virus that decimated global civilization in a matter of weeks.

historyLog.description: The player arrived at Eastbrook Safety Zone, one of the last secure havens in the region.
Eastern perimeter sensors detected movement, triggering heightened alert status.

notes: Resources are dwindling throughout the safety zone. The infected have been showing signs of coordinated behavior in recent weeks, leading some to speculate they're evolving.
